What is the Verus ID and NFT Marketplace, and how does it work?

The Verus ID and NFT Marketplace is a decentralized platform where users can buy and sell VerusIDs and NFTs directly on the blockchain. Users can advertise their offers directly to the owner of an ID or NFT, or post the sale of their NFT on the worldwide blockchain for all to see. Transactions are executed in a completely decentralized way, with the option to use transparent or zero-knowledge private addresses. Payments can be made directly, peer-to-peer, without the need for intermediaries, and owners can still choose to share proceeds with value-added agents or other participants in the digital ownership economy.

Our next step is the testnet rollout of the Ethereum bridge, and after a few days of that proving out in final testing and review, we will deploy it on mainnet as soon as we believe it is ready for permanent use.
